title: Atlantic slave trade and cash crops

content.question: The trend shown on the graph above is best explained by

choices.label: increased production of cash crops like sugar
growth of silver mining in New Spain
industrialized textile mills’ demand for raw cotton
African slave-trading kingdoms’ demand for European trade goods

content.answer: increased production of cash crops like sugar

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
